cpsr.planning.ertapprox

Interface IERTEnsemble

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionERTEnsemble, SingleERTEnsemble

    public interface IERTEnsemble
    Class defines ensemble of extremely random trees used for planning with Q-iteration. Serves as one interface between cpsr package and afest package.
    Author:
    William Hamilton

    • Method Summary
